name: Memories of Mysteries
description:
After fighting to her death, Anna wakes up in a nightmarish dreamworld.

"How long have I been here...(where?)

It doesn't matter. Time doesn't matter...Nothing does. Soon this colourful nothingness will consume me (will it?) leaving not a single trace of my existence.  

The sounds of sword clashing and people screaming. I can still faintly hear it in the back of my mind.

I died, or did I. I lost, didn't I? It seems to me like I am floating, lost in my own thoughts. Maybe I really am, maybe that's what death is. Being forever trapped inside your own mind, without any means of escape.  

I am so confused..." 

Uncover parts of Annas past while trying to escape by solving various riddles and puzzles.
Sit back, listen and enjoy, but be wary.  Something is lurking in the dark. Waiting for you. Longing for your soul.

YoU CAn'T EsCApE

Full voiceover and original music.

If you have any questions you can contact us via email at  memoriesofmysteries@gmail.com
